Message.Title: Obama victory hammering Apple shares
Message.Msg: Investors want out before Obama's capital gains increase takes effect Decembers Cap gains selloff has started in early November Markets will be down 20% by New Years

You Libs need to explain to me how the Govt is better off with higher Cap Gains rates Does the Govt generate more revenue with a 15% rate and a company like AAPL at $700... or a 20% rate with AAPL at $540? Many AAPL shareholders no longer even have a gain to tax.... They have a loss (@20%) to offset the gains in other stocks... which only reduces tax revenues further What a great policy Obama has embarked us on

Next we can discuss the "wealth effect"... and what such a massive decline in wealth does to consumer spending and consumer confidence The Obama recession gained speed yesterday... went supersonic if not warp speed
dear mr. #$%$.. the nation was in FAR BETTER shape in the higher tax eras of Clinton or even reagan.

Message.Title: Chris Christie is now a big fan of Obama it seems really smart people do wise up
Message.Msg: "New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie (R) told reporters Thursday he reached out to President Barack Obama with a personal phone call to congratulate him on his reelection. Mitt Romney, the man Christie had campaigned with and raised money for, got a conciliatory email, the governor said. “We didn’t have a political strategy discussion," Christie said of his Wednesday phone chat with Obama, Bloomberg reports. "I said, 'Congratulations on your win last night, Mr. President,' and he said, 'Thank you.'" Asked if he'd given Romney the same treatment, Christie said that he hadn't. “No; we exchanged e-mails last night,” Christie said, according to Bloomberg. “We haven’t spoken on the phone yet.”

Topic.Title: Chris Christie is now a big fan of Obama it seems really smart people do wise up

Message.Msg: Some people think I am a cynic. They may bee right. When I first heard Christie extolling Obama, my immediate think was he was trying to torpedo Romney because if Mitt won Christie couldn't possibly get the nomination in '16. The few Rebubs l have talked to,. assure me that Christie is an honest man and not a lying Politician like the rest of his party. I remain unconvinced.
